songs.title: Something ’Bout a Woman
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Well there's something about a woman
With my T-shirt on
Hair in her eyes, no make-up on
Standing there smiling with my coffee cup
Yeah there's something about a woman that's easy to love

Yeah there's something about a woman
That's a clear blue sky
Have not found nothing better that'll get you high
You're the colors of the sun at the end of the day
Yeah there's something about a woman that makes you feel that way

[Chorus]
She's like a fire on the mountain
Like some kind of heaven that's pouring down on me
She's a child
She's a lady
She's got everything that I could ever need
Yeah, there's something about a woman and me

[Verse 2]
Yeah there's something about a woman
When she gets fixed up
Slips a red dress on and her eyes light up
I love to watch her walking from across the room
Yeah there's something about a woman
And the way she moves me
She moves me
Oh, she moves me

[Chorus]

[Verse 3]
She moves me
She moves me
Oh, she moves me
She's like fire on the mountain
Like some kind of heaven that's pouring down on me
She's a child
She's a lady
She's got everything that I could ever need
Yeah, there's something about a woman and me

[Outro]
Yeah there's something about a woman that makes me still
There's something about a woman that always will
